Description: The following statement contains a magic number: List<string> argList = new List<string>(4);

The following statement contains a magic number: if (home == ToExpand)              {                  var path = Environment.GetFolderPath(                      Environment.SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData);                  // Path is in the form of <userhomepath>\AppData\Local'                  // for example' C:\Users\Andy\AppData\Local.                  var matches = Regex.Matches(path' @"\\");                  var len = matches[matches.Count - 2].Index;                  home = path.Substring(0' len);              }
